name: Stickman Jump - Free Addictive Extreme Fun Doodle Runner and Jumper game
name_original: Stickman Jump - Free Addictive Extreme Fun Doodle Runner and Jumper game
description:
Stickman Jumps and gives you extreme fun through super doodling environments, Help Stickman jump his way through the ingenious and tricky levels in game! INSANELY ADDICTIVE GAME!

How to play:
1. Tap the screen to jump over the obstacle.
2. Tap and Hold the screen for higher jumps.
3. Collect Snow Flakes for power-ups.

Great power ups gives you extreme and different fun for each different levels, try to jump through all fun, tricky levels.

Key Features:

1. Amazing Doodle Environments.
2. Incredible, Tricky, Great Fun 12 Levels.
3. Great snow flakes to be collected for exciting power ups.
4. Global Leaderboards for high scores-jumps.
5. Collect Snow Flakes for power-ups.

Remember! This is addictive; too much addictive!
Don't be late! Download the Stickman Jump today and please write your reviews at app store, It will really help us making more better games for you!

Thanks for playing! Have a nice day!
